price: 74. Y quienes no creen en la otra vida se desvían de él.
arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَٰكِبُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati ʿani al-ṣirāṭi lanākibūna
